# servicePredictions

**Instance Property**

An asychronous sequence of current predictions.

## Declaration

```swift
final var servicePredictions: any AsyncSequence<[ServicePrediction], any Error> { get }
```

## Discussion

To act on predictions about wireless service changes, use a `for`-`await`-`in` loop to iterate over events produced by this sequence as conditions change. Each update provides either an array of [doc://com.apple.WirelessInsights/documentation/WirelessInsights/ServicePrediction] instances representing the current set of predictions or throws a [doc://com.apple.WirelessInsights/documentation/WirelessInsights/ServicePredictionError]. Only act on the most recent array of predictions received from the sequence.



## Receiving service predictions

- **ServicePrediction**: An individual prediction of anticipated cellular network availability.
- **ServicePredictionError**: A type that represents errors encountered while using the WirelessInsights framework.
